Mullins had n't been gone long when someone busted into his house and went on a stealing spree around noon .
He was out ordering cupcakes for his son 's first birthday .
His wife , April , came home from work for a lunch break to find the door wide open and the inside much emptier .

I walked in and that piece of wood was laying in the floor , April Mullins said , I looked over and the TV was gone and I was like ' oh no ' and I walked into the bedroom and that TV was gone and everything was out of our drawers .
Jeff and April Mullins are still in shock that someone walked into their home and helped themselves to televisions , computers , checks , a safe and even Jeff 's PTSD medicines .
He joined the marines at 18 years old and served three tours of duty in Iraq .
Now he 's dedicated to protecting his family .
